title: Still have a problem
body: so for like a few weeks now ive been trying to play league but it just crashes after the champion selection and the loading screen doesnt come up the screen just goes black; this problem has arised when there was that error of multiple people having this same problem except mine never got fixed...so what the freak am I supposed to do?

replies.body: Are you running Windows 10? If so, some recent updates that rolled out for the anniversary made some changes to the Xbox app and game DVR is now enabled by default. You may be able to resolve this issue by either [disabling game DVR](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) or [rolling back those windows updates](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/).
alright sorry for the late reply but i havent been checking this...I got leaverbuster because of this problem is there a way i can get that removed?

We cannot modify or remove [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties in any way. This is because regardless of the reason for disconnecting from a match, it still negatively impacts everyone in it. Because of this, the Leaverbuster system treats all disconnections as equal. 

I recommend testing any changes in a custom match with no human players to avoid incurring penalties while you find a permanent fix for your issue.
